body:
Just curious to see what time are people on Avicus?
For the past couple of days. I've been joining the server, and it only had less than 12 players.
Don't know if it's just their schedules, or if there are certain times to be on?
body_tagged:
Just curious to see what time are people on Avicus?
For the past couple of days. I've been joining the server, and it only had less than 12 players.
Don't know if it's just their schedules, or if there are certain times to be on?
title: Best times to be on Avicus.

replies.body:
It depends what timezone you're in.
The majority of the player base consists of Americans, so it'll increase when they're all online and decrease when they're asleep.
If you're living around Australia (Timezone wise), then it'll be common to see these low numbers because all the Americans aren't on.

replies.body:
I always see low numbers both when it's like 8 PM or when it's 6 AM.... 
The players counter doesn't fluctuate that much...

replies.body: 3 people yesterday. That was at 6-7pm AEST.
replies.body_tagged: 3 people yesterday. That was at 6-7pm AEST.

replies.body: Friday Sat and Sun are the best days to be on around afternoon or at night!
replies.body_tagged: Friday Sat and Sun are the best days to be on around afternoon or at night!

replies.body: Eu 9pm is good since some Eu players (me being one of them) are on and that's when east coast start to login too.

replies.body: For EU players, it's like pizza said in the evening
